inputFormat:
The first line of the input contains one integer $ t $ ( $ 1       \le t \le 10^4 $ ) — the number of test cases. Then $ t $ test cases follow.

The only line of the test case contains one integer $ n $ ( $ 2       \le n \le 2 \cdot 10^5 $ ) — the length of the array. It is guaranteed that that $ n $ is even (i.e. divisible by $ 2 $ ).

It is guaranteed that the sum of $ n $ over all test cases does not exceed $ 2 \cdot 10^5 $ ( $ \sum n \le 2 \cdot 10^5 $ ).
outputFormat: For each test case, print the answer — "NO" (without quotes), if there is no suitable answer for the given test case or "YES" in the first line and any suitable array a1,a2,…,an (1≤ai≤10^9) satisfying conditions from the problem statement on the second line.
translation:
### 题意简述

给定 $n$（$n$ 是偶数），要求构造一个长度为 $n$ 的数列 $\{a_n\}$，使其满足以下条件：

- 前 $\dfrac{n}{2}$ 个数为偶数，后 $\dfrac{n}{2}$ 个数为奇数。

- 前 $\dfrac{n}{2}$ 个数的和等于后 $\dfrac{n}{2}$ 个数的和。

- $a_i\ne a_j(1\le i,j\le n)$。

感谢 @[CSP_Sept](/user/224931) 提供的翻译。
